messages.title: A Strong Green Voice for Lancaster & Fleetwood
messages.content: If not now, when? We are currently in a climate emergency. The Green Party is the only political party committed to reaching net zero emissions by 2030. Please vote Green on 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is committed to reaching net zero emissions by 2030.

images.caption: Caroline Jackson with Green Party MP Caroline Lucas.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet encourages to display it as a poster, contribute to the campaign fund, follow on Facebook, and join the Green Party.
